metadata.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The Emperor is not very impressed and directs them towards the rubble to try finding them. They'll encounter a small group of Kobolds digging through the rubble who will be holding them. On entering combat, they'll run away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_Destroyed

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: You dropped the Netherstones! Search the rubble and pray no one else found them.

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: You dropped the Netherstone! Search the rubble and pray that no one else found it.
